channel.title: Cooks Assistant Dialogue
channel.description:
Hello people of Moparscape, I am adding my first attempt at a quest to my server. I am wondering if anyone has the cooks FULL dialogue. I have the dialogue for the option "What's wrong?" but I do not have dialogue if the player chooses "Nice hat!" or "Can you make me a cake?"
If anyone has the dialogue for the extra options I would greatly appreciate it if you post it in this thread.
[s]Love[/s]Sincerely, Docent
EDIT : Found it thanks all!

item.title: Cooks Assistant Dialogue

just watch 07 rs videos on youtube for the quest guide

item.title: Cooks Assistant Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:526362”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=645104.msg4339724#msg4339724 date=1374974816]

I have the dialogue for the option “What wrong?”

do not have dialogue if the player chooses “Nice hat!” or “Can you make me a cake?”

wut???
didn’t you just say them
[/quote]

Like if the player chose one of those options what would he say?[/quote]
Search in server downloads for a server that has the quest and rip the text.
I mean to remember there is even a tutorial released here, that used cook’s assistant quest.

Read full topic
